title.narrative: Increasing survival and reducing poverty of disabled children and adults in Malawi

description.narrative: Disabled children and adults have improved health, mobility and knowledge about the prevention of HIV/AIDS, enabling them to survive longer and be included in education and employment activities, thereby reducing their poverty and contributing to the MDGs in Malawi.;

sector.narrative: Increasing the mobility and reducing poverty of disabled children and adults.
